DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct compare effectiveness integrate chiropractic acupuncture care management low back pain .
DOC.brief_title: Integrated Chiropractic Acupuncture Treatment Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct Southern California University Health Sciences . Eligible subject randomize one three treatment group : chiropractic care alone , acupuncture care alone , chiropractic acupuncture care combine . Subjects treat pragmatic basis 60 day follow additional 60 day . All examination treatment provide free charge . The expected benefit participant decrease pain improved function .
DOC.criteria: Are 18 year old Have current episode low back pain Received chiropractic treatment manipulative therapy within last month Received acupuncture treatment within last month Visceral , systemic joint inflammatory disease refer pain back pelvis Nonmechanical low back pain A history low back surgery Osteoporosis Spondylolisthesis Coagulation disorder take anticoagulant medication Prolonged systemic corticosteroid medication Progressive unilateral low limb muscle weakness Symptoms sign cauda equina syndrome ( e.g. , bowel bladder dysfunction ) Severe concurrent illness ( e.g. , cancer , heart disease , psychiatric disorder ) Known pregnancy
